item.title: Godot course release 10: User Interface
item.author: nathan@gdquest.com (Nathan Lovato)
item.description: This month’s update adds 2 hours of tutorials dedicated to particles! There are now over 70 video tutorials in the course’s Pro version . Learn to design Game User Interface with Godot This chapter is only in the Indie and Pro versions of the course. You will learn: How to keep your UI separate from your gameplay code Pause, and a simple pause menu using Godot’s UI themes An animated and configurable player lifebar Lifebars that automatically follow monsters and characters Get the course!
